subject: Olympic Games (2024)
lead_paragraph: Sought by Massachusetts Gov. Charlie Baker, the overhauled plan to attract the Games lacked key pieces of information, including insurance against cost overruns, identities of venues and plans for an athletes’ village.
snippet: Sought by Massachusetts Gov. Charlie Baker, the overhauled plan to attract the Games lacked key pieces of information, including insurance against cost overruns, identities of venues and plans for an athletes’ village.
